statements: DELETE FROM patient_progress WHERE therapist_name = 'Dr. Smith'
DELETE FROM patient_progress WHERE therapy_session_id = 1 AND therapist_name = 'Dr. Smith'
DELETE FROM patient_progress WHERE intervention_name = 'Physical Therapy'
DELETE FROM Interventions WHERE intervention_category = 'Physical Therapy';
DELETE FROM PatientProgress WHERE patient_id = 100 AND therapy_id = 2 AND progress_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM therapy_sessions WHERE therapist_id = 101 AND session_date <= '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM patients WHERE therapy_type = 'Physical Therapy';
